title: Satin Bonnet Sleep Cap Hair Cover Bonnet Satin Lined Slouchy Beanie Silk Lined Night Sleeping Hat for Cuirly Hair
features: Material: Outer 100% Bamboo Cotton, Lining is high quality satin silk, which is treated by color fixing technical process. We have upgrated from the basic nightcap to make it softer and more functional

Adjustable Size Design. The adjustable strap design empowers our sleep hat can fit heads of most sizes and meet the need of fastening head and maintaining your head safe and stable for a specific post-surgical treatment purpose

Satin Silk Lining. Soft and breathable. The practical satin silk lining reduces the friction and the water-loss of your hairs when your head is exposed overnight. Multifunctional Application. It can work as the workout hat when you are running, cycling and playing the basketball, or as a daily head-wear when hanging around or on windy days

Washing Instructions for Satin Bonnet: 1.Hand wash or machine wash in cool water on low setting/ gentle cycle; 2. Air dry the saint bonnet; As a general rule, satin can be hand washed with cold water and gentle soaps;It should be laid out flat or hung to dry, although satin should not be attached with clothespins, since they will leave marks; Satin should also not be twisted or contorted while it is wet, because it may set permanent wrinkles in the fabric.
